channel.title: [Forge][1.4.7] ~ BenchCraft ~
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/inqwlf.png[/img][/center] First and foremost, Thanks Tom :) Permissions: Tom (MoparCraft Admin): http://i48.tinypic.com/14uz4wp.png iChun (Creator of Portal Gun Mod for MineCraft): http://i46.tinypic.com/2a8i4ci.png
irc: irc.moparisthebest.com channel:#benchcraft
I'll be on irc a lot, so if you have any questions/concerns feel free to drop on by. Thanks Zuppers for showing me how to setup a channel :D
[b]This will be a private server pack available to those in this community[/b], since I don't want to deal with copyright claims lol...
Greetings, this thread is for the development of a MC server using the Forge modding API [Build #497 for MC 1.4.7]. It will feature a decent amount of mods that utilize the Forge API.
Current mods (this is not a set list, some mods may be removed/added later)
[ul][li]Red Power 2 (http://www.eloraam.com/) [list] [li]Lead: Eloraam :)[/li] [li]Status: Need permission for release in a private server pack? I talked to an op on Elo's IRC Channel, he said to do it if the pack is distrubuted privately :/[/li] [li]To do: Get in contact and ask for permissions to include[/li] [li]Implemented: Yes?[/li] [li]What now? Idk lol[/li] [/list]
[/li]
[li]Industrial Craft (http://www.industrial-craft.net/) [list] [li]Lead: Alblaka/ IC2 Development Team[/li] [li]Status: No licensing issues, link to website of the mod must be visable and credits be given[/li] [li]To do: Nothing at the moment[/li] [li]Implemented: Yes[/li] [li]Add-ons: CompactSolars by cpw of industrial-craft forums[/li] [/list]
[/li]
[li]Chicken Bones Mods (http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/909223-145146-smp-chickenbones-mods/) [list] [li]Lead: Chicken_Bones[/li] [li]Status: No licensing issues, link to website of the mod must be visable and credits be given[/li] [li]To do: Nothing at the moment[/li] [li]Implemented: Yes[/li] [li]Mod Sublist: CodeChickenCore, Not Enough Items, Wireless Redstone Chicken Bones Edition (WR-CBE)[/li] [/list]
[/li]
[li]Build Craft [list] [li]Leads: SirSengir, Spacetoad, and Krapht (http://www.mod-buildcraft.com)[/li] [li]Status: Licensed under the Minecraft Mod Public License, under this license "The user is allowed to redistribute this mod partially, in totality, or included in a distribution", I also included a copy of the license in the mod package[/li] [li]To do: Nothing at the moment[/li] [li]Implemented: Yes[/li] [/list]
[/li]
[li]ThaumCraft (http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1585216-thaumcraft-301c-updated-22122012/) [list] [li]Lead: Azanor [/li] [li]Status: "I'm not planning on adding any additional modpacks to this list anytime soon, so don't call me, I'll call you. The only exceptions to this rule are private server modpacks that won't be publically available" - Azanor[/li] [li]To do: Nothing at the moment[/li] [li]mplemented: Yes[/li] [/list]
[/li]
[li] Forestry (http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/700588-forestry-for-minecraft-trees-bees-and-more-1702-updated-08012013/) [list] [li]Lead: SirSengir[/li] [li]Status: Quote from his license: "Server Packs: Private server packs are granted permission to include past and the current client versions of Forestry in a mod pack tailored exclusively for that Minecraft server. The pack must be distributed in a way that ensures that only players currently active on that server can download it. Private server packs are only mod packs intended for use by a closed membership Minecraft server and distributed only to those members. Please refrain from asking for explicit permission if your server pack fulfills the above conditions, it clogs up my inbox."[/li] [li]To do: Nothing at the moment[/li] [li]Implemented: Yes[/li] [/list]
[/li]
[li]ComputerCraft (http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/892282-147-146-computercraft-1481-touchscreen-monitors/) [list] [li]Lead: dan200[/li] [li]Status: Quote from the license found on above stated topic "I also give permission for ComputerCraft to be included in any and all mod packs, provided that the ComputerCraft files are included completely unmodified" -dan200[/li] [li]To do: nothing at the moment[/li] [li]Implemented: Heck Yes![/li] [/list]
[/li]
[li]Thermal Expansion (http://thermalexpansion.wikispaces.com/) [list] [li]Lead: KingLemmingCoFH[/li] [li]Status: This guy gets it, thanks a bunches man! Check license on site[/li] [li]To do: Nothing at the moment[/li] [li]Implemented: Yes[/li] [/list]
[/li]
[li]MineChem (http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1611745-minechem-2-pr61-now-with-chemistry-turtles-8th-jan-tue/) [list] [li]Lead: ljdp[/li] [li]Status: Minechem is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported[/li] [li]To do: Nothing at the moment[/li] [li]Implemented: YES![/li] [/list]
[/li]
[li]Portal Gun mod [url=http://ichun.us]iChun.us[/url] [list] [li]Lead:iChun[/li] [li]Status: Permission granted to include in a private pack[/li] [li]To do: Nothing at the moment[/li] [li]Implemented: Yes[/li] [/list]
[/li]
[li] Power Convertors! (http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1629898-146-powercrystals-mods-powerconverters2-is-here-mfr-and-more/) [list] [li]Lead: power crystals[/li] [li]Status: No licensing conflicts, quote from lead: "You are free to include any of my mods in any modpacks or server-specific packs without needing to ask permission"[/li] [li]To do: Nothing at the moment[/li] [li]Implemented: No[/li] [li]Dependence: PowerCrystals Core[/li] [li]Removed? Yes, due to it being too OP and the ratio's they use make no sense whats so ever too me, also, use electric enegines :P[/li] [/list]
[/li][/ul]
In progress of being added: No more mods will be added at this time
Suggestions are welcomed and will be taken into consideration, I reserve the right to add whatever I deem fit, constantly posting/bugging me won't do anything and will probably get you on my bad side (directed at Agl :P)
In the meantime, I am hosting a whitelisted Tekkit 3.1.2 server, thread located [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,594433.0.html]here[/url]
Updates: 1. Upgraded Forge to 1.4.7, Build #497 2. More mods have been added! 3. Portal Gun has been added! 4. Server will be white-listed 5. Alpha testing will commence once Relmitos has the launcher fully functional! 6. More polishing, universal ores have been configured 7. Trying the name BenchCraft for the server, has a nice ring to it :) 8. Removed power converters 9. Removed Figu's mods 10.Updated to Forge build #499 11.Updated to the latest version of Forestry 12.Updated to the latest version of Thermal Expansion 13.Updated to Forge build #533 14. Updated Buildcraft, thermal expansion, and portal gun.
Gems/ores/shards currently in-game: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/28t7s6v.png[/img]
To do:
[ol][li][s]Universal ores -Copper (3 different ores and ingots currently exist) -Tin (3 different ores and ingots currently exist)[/s][/li] [li]More polishing[/li][/ol]
Back to the drawing board.

item.title: [Forge][1.4.7] ~ BenchCraft ~
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

hmmm i was thinking the metallurgy mod is a good idea to add since it adds a lot of new ores and it has full compatibility with any forge mods so the ores are interchangeable so no issues on that part(pm creator for permission)

http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/744918-146132forgebukkitsmp-metallurgy-2-242-12262012-putting-the-mine-back-in-minecraft/

also i cant remember if you added the iron chests mod or not(owner just wants credit where due it seems but i would pm him as a sign of respect)

http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/981855-147-13w02b-forge-universal-ironchests-50-obsidian-chests/

and last but not least the enderchests mod(theres a bunch of mods and would have to install the codechickencore to have everything work and the modpack terms are same as iron chests mod)

http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/909223-145146-smp-chickenbones-mods/

also just a simple note I understand if you dont wanna add any of em

EDIT: a good reason to add railcraft:http://railcraft.wikispaces.com/Iron+Tank+(Device)

EDIT 2: misc peripherals i told you about on server http://www.computercraft.info/forums2/index.php?/topic/4587-cc15mc147-miscperipherals-31/

Read full topic

item.title: [Forge][1.4.7] ~ BenchCraft ~
item.dc:creator: @big_n12 big_n12
item.description:
@big_n12 wrote:

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:30, topic:477977”]Update: Forge essentials has be re-added, got around to adding different user groups and permissions. It’s still a WIP mod and not a lot of its features have been documented, still figuring it out along the way. One of it’s features is called Zones, basically protected area’s with a local Zone Admin that has full control over the area. I have no idea how it works atm lol

Update: Figured out how zones work, these will serve as chest zones for players seeing as you, and only you, can interact with your chest zone

Update2:
World limits have been put in place, the world is now square with radius 1000 blocks from center[/quote]

Aw siver not world boundaries. There annoying

Read full topic

item.title: [Forge][1.4.7] ~ BenchCraft ~
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Update: Forge essentials has be re-added, got around to adding different user groups and permissions. It’s still a WIP mod and not a lot of its features have been documented, still figuring it out along the way. One of it’s features is called Zones, basically protected area’s with a local Zone Admin that has full control over the area. I have no idea how it works atm lol

Update: Figured out how zones work, these will serve as chest zones for players seeing as you, and only you, can interact with your chest zone

Update2:
World limits have been put in place, the world is now square with radius 1000 blocks from center

Read full topic
